original_text: The leaves thereof were fair, and the fruit thereof much, and in it was meat for all: the beasts of the field had shadow under it, and the fowls of the heaven dwelt in the boughs thereof, and all flesh was fed of it.
korean_text: 그 잎사귀는 아름답고 그 열매는 많아서 만민의 먹을 것이 될 만하고 들짐승이 그 그늘에 있으며 공중에 나는 새는 그 가지에 깃들이고 육체를 가진 모든 것이 거기에서 먹을 것을 얻더라

sentences.original_text: and in it was meat for all
sentences.korean_translation: 그 안에는 모든 자를 위한 양식이 있었으니

sentences.original_text: the beasts of the field had shadow under it
sentences.korean_translation: 들의 짐승들이 그 그늘 아래 있었고

sentences.original_text: and the fowls of the heaven dwelt in the boughs thereof
and all flesh was fed of it
